description.english: Win 1 quick match! Welcome to the winning team!
description.french: Remportez une partie ! Bienvenue dans l'équipe des vainqueurs !
description.italian: Vinci una partita: benvenuto nella squadra vincente!
description.spanish: Gana una partida. ¡Bienvenido al equipo ganador!
description.japanese: マッチに1回勝利する！勝者チームへようこそ！

description.english: Kill 10 opponents in a quick match while they are affected by a Digi Grenade.
description.german: Knipse 10 Gegner aus, die noch unter Wirkung einer Digi-Granate leiden.
description.french: Kill 10 opponents in a quick match while they are affected by a Digi Grenade.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 avversari colpiti da una granata digitale.
description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos mientras estén bajo los efectos de una granada digital.
description.japanese: Digi Grenadeで撹乱させた敵を10人倒す

description.english: Achieve a win in any game mode on every map in quick match games!
description.german: Gewinne einmal auf allen Karten in allen Spielmodi!
description.french: Achieve a win in any game mode on every map in quick match games!
description.italian: Ottieni una vittoria in ogni modalità su ogni mappa!
description.spanish: Gana una partida en todos los mapas del juego en cualquier modo.
description.japanese: 全マップで任意のゲームモードに勝利する！

description.english: Headshot 25 opponents while they are using HRV in quick match games.
description.german: Stanze 25 Gegnern, die gerade ihr HRV benutzen, ein Luftloch in die Mütze.
description.french: Headshot 25 opponents while they are using HRV in quick match games.
description.italian: Metti a segno 25 colpi alla testa contro avversari che stanno usando l'HRV.
description.spanish: Abate de un tiro en la cabeza a 25 enemigos que estén usando el HRV.
description.japanese: 現在HRVを使用している25名の敵にヘッドショットを決める

description.english: Kill an opponent with their own weapon in a quick match. Ouch!
description.german: Demonstriere an einem Gegner, dass seine eigene Waffe funktioniert.
description.french: Kill an opponent with their own weapon in a quick match. Ouch!
description.italian: Uccidi un avversario con la sua stessa arma. Ahia!
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con su propia arma. ¡Ay!
description.japanese: 敵の武器を使って敵を倒す

description.english: Kill 25 opponents in quick match games while they are EMPed!
description.german: Ziehe 25 Gegnern den Stecker, denen ein EMP-Ei einen Neustart empfohlen hat.
description.french: Kill 25 opponents in quick match games while they are EMPed!
description.italian: Uccidi 25 avversari colpiti da un EMP!
description.spanish: Mata a 25 enemigos mientras estén bajo los efectos de una granada de PEM.
description.japanese: EMPを受けている敵を25名倒す

description.english: Reach the rank of Second Lieutenant.
description.french: Reach the rank of Second Lieutenant.
description.italian: Ottieni il grado di Second Lieutenant.
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango de Second Lieutenant.
description.japanese: Second Lieutenantのランクに昇進する

description.french: Achieve the rank of Brigadier General.  Hats off to you!
description.italian: Raggiungi il grado di Brigadier Generale. Complimenti!
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango de Brigadier General. ¡Sí, señor!
description.japanese: Brigadier Generalのランクに昇進する。君には脱帽だ！

description.english: Achieve the rank of Brigadier General.  Hats off to you!
description.german: Hacke alle Kontrollpunkte auf allen Mehrspieler-Karten.
description.french: Hack every control point on every multiplayer map in quick match games.
description.italian: Viola tutti i punti di controllo in tutte le mappe multiplayer.
description.spanish: Piratea todos los puntos de control de todos los mapas multijugador.
description.japanese: すべてのマルチプレイヤーマップで全制御ポイントをハッキングする

description.english: Hack every control point on every multiplayer map in quick match games.
